Bilal values and is interested in research, technology, economics, and human values

analysis_notes.context: Early 2023 conversation about personal development at Bloom. Bilal is assessing his own growth areas and seeking structured activities.
analysis_notes.key_insight: Strong tension between breadth (interdisciplinary interests, many domains) and depth (execution, follow-through). This tension seems central to Bilal's work style.
analysis_notes.question_for_later_convos: Does this execution challenge persist throughout 2023-2025? Or does he develop systems to address it?
